title: Which line do you like the most and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: In terms of maths, I really like the look of a line exactly at a gradient of 2, which I think I owe to my OCD. It just seems so perfect and steady. In terms of curves and parabolas, i prefer any really, as long as they are centred along the y axis. Again OCD. Darnit!
